game.name: Elsa Restaurant Vegetarian Meatloaf
game.description:
Our most favourite princess Elsa always loves to accept a new challenge. Today is not going to be easy for her since she has accepted a challenge of preparing scrumptious delicious vegetarian meatloaf for her lovely sister. Make sure that you play this popular free online cooking game for girls with full of confidence to deliver the best possible outcomes. Use the knife to chop the greens and the vegetables properly. Pick up the beans and put them in a bowl and leave them to be boiled as it requires. 

In this free online cooking game for girls, you also have to take care of preparing the needful ingredients and putting them all together in order to prepare a meat stuffing which you are advised to cook in the oven available in the kitchen area. Be careful while following the recipe by your own. Start this cool html5 game and have fun. We know that you are quite excited to prepare the meals in the menu of her restaurant. Anna is her regular customer and today she wants to eat a vegetarian meatloaf. Help the girl to complete the order of her favourite customer. 

In the first level, put the white lentils and leave them to be boiled in a bowl for a few minutes. Chop garlic, basil and onions in a proper size for preparing the dish. You can then put the prepped ingredients and mix them with the lentils. It is your job to use the mixture of some cheese on top of it. Add some oats, pepper and tomato sauce salt. Use your skills and prepare a proper paste out of them and shape it as your best customer favourite dish meatloaf in a tray. Bake it in the oven to get it ready for serving. Good luck to make it delicious and impress Anna a lot!
